title: Oval Diamond and Sapphire Vaddanam Pendant - Contemporary Mandala Design
materials: Round Cut Sapphire (0.73ct). Crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This pendant showcases a captivating mandala-inspired design. The intricately detailed rose gold base is adorned with sparkling diamonds, radiating outwards from a central, mesmerizing sapphire. The delicate filigree work adds a touch of traditional artistry to this modern piece. The oval shape lends a contemporary touch to this timeless design.
occasions: and adding a touch of elegance to everyday wear. Also suitable for pre-wedding events like the Sangeet or Mehendi
offering a contemporary twist on traditional South Indian jewelry.
description: This pendant offers a unique blend of contemporary design and traditional craftsmanship. The brilliant-cut diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the deep blue sapphire adds a touch of royalty. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Its versatile design allows it to be worn on a chain as a pendant or incorporated into a custom Vaddanam (waist belt) design.
